definition: to drop from the sky/(fig.) to appear out of nowhere/(attributive) airborne
to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend

sentences.english: Commando force joined up with the airborne troops near the captured bridge.
sentences.chinese: 突击队和空降部队在被占领的桥梁附近汇合。

sentences.english: The airborne units were to secure the flanks of the amphibious assault.
sentences.chinese: 空降部队的任务是从侧翼掩护两栖进攻。

sentences.english: Airborne, the new dance photography of Lois Greenfield.
sentences.chinese: 空降，新舞蹈摄影的洛伊丝绿地。

sentences.english: A battalion of the 82nd Airborne Division will be heading to Afghanistan soon.
sentences.chinese: 阿的第82空降师营将很快前往阿富汗。

sentences.english: "Both boys were members of the 101st Airborne Division, " she said.
sentences.chinese: 凯瑟琳说，“他们兄弟俩都是101空降部队的成员。

sentences.english: The airborne forces however met hard fortune.
sentences.chinese: 但是，空降部队遇到了不幸的命运。

sentences.english: Airborne troops are hiding their chutes and going to the gathering points.
sentences.chinese: 空降部队正在隐藏他们的降落伞，去集合地。

sentences.english: To appear at county fairs and carnivals in exhibitions of stunt flying and parachute jumping.
sentences.chinese: 一个遍游全国进行特技飞行和空降展览的飞行员。

sentences.english: How will Marines mount into a pod?
sentences.chinese: 枪兵将怎样登录空降舱？

sentences.english: I thought the soldiers in my airborne unit would think I was broken.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得空降师中的战友会认为我已濒临崩溃。

sentences.english: So the first scouts start the landing operation.
sentences.chinese: 首批侦察机开始空降行动。

sentences.english: So the planes are coming to prepare the area for landing of Airborne troops and heavy vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 飞机过来为空降地及重型机械做准备。

sentences.english: Objective To select the optimum psychological health service support plan for airborne troops in wartime.
sentences.chinese: 目的筛选最优化的空降兵战时心理卫生保障方案。

sentences.english: The enemy will not have strength to repeat such descents often.
sentences.chinese: 敌人没有经常进行这种空降的力量。

sentences.english: They also report Allied paratroop landings in the Channel Islands.
sentences.chinese: 他们还报道，盟军伞兵在海峡群岛实施了空降。

sentences.english: Canine distemper is much less rare, and it is airborne.
sentences.chinese: 犬瘟热是少得多罕见的，这是空降。

definition: to assemble/to concentrate/to mass/to build up/to marshal
war zone/combat zone/(military) theater of operations
to enter and garrison/(fig.) to establish a presence in
to fight in one place after another
to go to war/to engage in war
